questions.question: What does the spell 'Aguamenti' do?
options: Creates a shield around the caster
Produces water from the tip of the caster's wand
Teleports the caster to a specific location
questions.correctAnswer: Produces water from the tip of the caster's wand

What is the significance of 'Thestrals' in the wizarding world?
options: They serve as transportation in the Forbidden Forest.
They guard the entrance to the Department of Mysteries.
They are ancient protectors of the Ministry of Magic.
They are magical creatures that can only be seen by those who have witnessed death.
questions.correctAnswer: They are magical creatures that can only be seen by those who have witnessed death.

questions.question: Which event marks the start of the Triwizard Tournament?
options: The unveiling of the Quidditch World Cup.
The appearance of the Dark Mark at the Quidditch match.
The Goblet of Fire chooses the champions from each participating school.
The arrival of the Durmstrang and Beauxbatons delegations at Hogwarts.
questions.correctAnswer: The Goblet of Fire chooses the champions from each participating school.
